Submodules¶

wisps.mospred.computations module¶

wisps.mospred.create module¶

wisps.mospred.create.calc_vorticity()¶

Sets up the calculation for vorticity.

wisps.mospred.create.get_function(observedProperty)¶

wisps.mospred.dew_point module¶

wisps.mospred.dew_point.dsewpoint(dewpt_obj)¶

Compute gridded dew point temperature using pressure, mixing ratio, or specific humidity on an isobaric, constant height, or a sigma surface.

wisps.mospred.dew_point_corr module¶

wisps.mospred.dew_point_corr.dewpoint_corr_setup(dewpt_obj)¶

Compute gridded dew point temperature correction using pressure, mixing ratio, or specific humidity on an isobaric, constant height, or a sigma surface.

wisps.mospred.interp module¶

wisps.mospred.interp.interp(x, y, model_values, station_lat, station_lon, method='linear')¶

x - the x coordinate values in projected grid y - the y coordinate values in projected grid model_values - grid point values for observations station_lat - 1 or 2 dimensional array of latitude points station_lon - 1 or 2 dimensional array of longitude points

wisps.mospred.interp.reproject(lon=None, lat=None)¶

Given collection of lat and lon, reproject into appropriate grid space.

wisps.mospred.interp.test(filename)¶

wisps.mospred.mixing_ratio module¶

wisps.mospred.mixing_ratio.mixing_ratio(pressure_arr, temperature_arr, rel_hum_arr)¶

Compute the mixing ratio

wisps.mospred.mixing_ratio.mixing_ratio_setup(mixrat_obj)¶

Compute gridded mixing ratio using pressure, temperature, and relative humidity (%) on an isobaric, a constant height, or a sigma surface.

wisps.mospred.parse_pred module¶

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.cell_method(in_str)¶

Matches in_str with a common representation of CF convention cell methods.

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.check_valid_keys(in_dict)¶
wisps.mospred.parse_pred.duration(in_str)¶

Returns a duration identifier.

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.forecast_ref_time(in_str)¶

Given a forecast reference Time, return a number of seconds since the epoch.

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.get_time_multiplier(in_str)¶
wisps.mospred.parse_pred.lead_time(in_str)¶

Given unformatted lead_time string, return number of seconds of leadTime.

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.observedProperty(in_str)¶

Try to find the observedProperty. If found, return full observedProperty path

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.separate_entries(in_str)¶

Attempts to seperate different entries. Returns a tuple of time and cell method if available.

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.source(in_str)¶

returns the source attribute in the mos predictor list

wisps.mospred.parse_pred.str2epoch(in_str)¶
wisps.mospred.parse_pred.vertical_coordinate(in_str)¶

Parses the vertical coordinate string. returns a dict, where: layer1 - first layer layer2 - second layer (if applicable) unit - unit of measurement cell_method - cell method if it’s multi layered

wisps.mospred.procedures module¶

wisps.mospred.procedures.example_map_projection_func(w_obj, *kwargs)¶
wisps.mospred.procedures.example_smooth_func(w_obj, *kwargs)¶
wisps.mospred.procedures.get_procedure(string)¶

Given a procedure string, returns a tuple where element 0 is the function, and element 1 is an array of arguments.

wisps.mospred.read_pred module¶

wisps.mospred.read_pred.apply_procedures(w_obj, procedures)¶
wisps.mospred.read_pred.get_variable(entry_dict)¶

Given a user-provided dictionary representing a desired variable, format it into a common form.

wisps.mospred.read_pred.parse_range(range_str)¶

Given a string such as ‘2013100100-2014033100,24h’, split into a ‘start’, ‘end’, and ‘stride’. return dict.

wisps.mospred.read_pred.read_predictors(yaml_file)¶

wisps.mospred.temp_corr module¶

wisps.mospred.temp_corr.temp_corr(pressure_arr, temperature_arr, rel_hum_arr)¶

Compute the mixing ratio

wisps.mospred.temp_corr.temp_corr_setup(mixrat_obj)¶

Compute gridded mixing ratio using pressure, temperature, and relative humidity (%) on an isobaric, a constant height, or a sigma surface.

wisps.mospred.wet_bulb module¶

wisps.mospred.wet_bulb.wet_bulb(pressure_arr, temperature_arr, rel_hum_arr)¶

Compute the mixing ratio

wisps.mospred.wet_bulb.wet_bulb_setup(mixrat_obj)¶

Compute gridded mixing ratio using pressure, temperature, and relative humidity (%) on an isobaric, a constant height, or a sigma surface.
